name: morel-games-core
description: Common front-end components and logics for all Morel browser minigames.

scripts.docs: jsdoc -d docs/js --readme README.md --package package.json -c jsdoc.config.json src/**/*.js src/*.js src/**/*.vue && vuese gen && mv website docs/vue

author: Amaury Carrade <amaury@carrade.eu> (https://amaury.carrade.eu)
